name: SeaMonkey Add-ons
short_description:
This project makes available Firefox add-ons for SeaMonkey, mostly adapted to SeaMonkey by an automated conversion process. The converted add-ons are without support of the authors. You use the add-ons on your own risk. For more information please read mozillaZine <http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=40&t=2834855>!

This project is neither an official Mozilla project nor an official SeaMonkey project.

More detailed information and more converted add-ons following soon, it is planned to make available converted versions for all add-ons listed in the mozillaZine article. 

Please open a ticket here if you find out that one of the converted add-ons here is no longer up to date  because that add-on has been updated at the Mozilla Add-on Repository, or if you observe bugs in the converted add-ons

Please leave a rating concerning the function of the add-on on the add-on homepage and a rating ("review") concerning the quality of the conversion here on sourceforge.
summary: This project makes available Firefox add-ons adapted to SeaMonkey
